mapper.select:
select rownum rno, pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from (select pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from gga_product order by pid desc) where
pname LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
pcategory LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
pname LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%' or pcategory LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%'
select pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from gga_product where pcategory=#{pcategory}

select rno, pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from (select rownum rno, pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from (select pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from gga_product order by pid desc)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}
select pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory from gga_product where pid=#{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into gga_product(pid, pname, pprice, GFILE, GSFILE, pcategory) values('P_'||to_char(sequ_gga_product.nextval, 'fm0000'), #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{gfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gsfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcategory})
